entries.no_target: With whom do you want to use you Image Design abilities?
entries.not_a_player: You can only use your Image Design abilities on players.
entries.no_image_self: You cannot use your Image Design abilities on yourself.
entries.target_dead: %TT needs a lot more than a make over.
entries.out_of_range: You must be closer to your target in order to use your Image Design abilities.
entries.not_in_same_group: You must be within the same group as %TT in order to use your Image Design abilities.
entries.not_an_image_designer: You must be an Image Designer to do that.
entries.insufficient_skill: You don't have enough skill for that modification.
entries.insufficient_mind: You don't have enough mind to do that.
entries.experience_granted: You have received %DI Image Designer experience.
entries.outstanding_offer: %TT already has an outstanding Image Design offer.
entries.out_of_range_designer: Your target has moved too far away.
entries.out_of_range_target: You are now too far away from the Image Designer.
entries.offer_declined: %TT has refused your Image Design offer.
entries.already_image_designing: You are already in the process of an Image Design action.
entries.offer_timeout: Your Image Design offer to %TT has timed out.
entries.offer_timeout_target: %TT's Image Design offer has timed out.
entries.target_is_image_designing: %TT is already Image Designing someone else.
entries.already_being_image_designed: You cannot initiate an Image Design session while being Image Designed.
entries.no_holoemote: You do not own a Holo-Emote generator. Please visit an Image Designer if you wish to purchase one.
entries.remove_holoemote: You have successfully removed your Holo-Emote generator.
entries.no_charges_holoemote: You have no charges remaining in your Holo-Emote generator.
entries.holoemote_help: Please type '/holoemote help' for valid Holo-Emote names.
entries.new_holoemote: Congratulations! You have purchased a new Holo-Emote generator. Type '/holoemote help' for instructions.
entries.insufficient_action: You don't have enough action to do that.
